items.sentence: They've confirmed it won't take more than two days.
It looks like you have the same problems that I do.
By the time I got there, everyone had already left.
I'm only telling you this because you're my friend.
You just have to deal with things the way they are.
Tom doesn't own a horse, but he has his own saddle.
I didn't know that Tom would have to do that today.
Tom picked up the snail and looked at it carefully.
When I got home, I saw Tom passed out on the floor.
I admire your ability to always see good in others.
